name: Verify File System Archiving
description: Checks the behavior of the file system upon arrival at Region 3 regarding the archiving or deletion of previous planet data.
testObjective: Clarify and verify intended file system behavior.
author: Christopher Rojas
preconditions: Player has just arrived at Region 3

steps.action: Check for Planet 1 and Planet 2 reports/archives
steps.expected: Previous data is either archived in a specific folder or removed (depending on intended design - currently checks for removal based on observation)

steps.action: Verify Region 3 initial files are present

postconditions: File system state is consistent with current design
